cause.description:
Pretty self-explanatory.
Too many people die each year from tragic, unnecessary Latex and Latex related Deaths.
We at the Human Fund want to ensure this figure is abolished FOREVER.
Please give generously
1. Money for People
2. If you Latex and Drive, your a bloody idiot
3. Latex is spelt Xetal Backwards, deal with it
4. All Donations are to be in the name of Kruger Industrial Smoothing
5. Latex Schmatex
6. To Anti-Dentite's, The Human Fund says NO
cause.mission: Find a cure to Latex and Latex Related Deaths
cause.name: The Human Fund'
